name: EXHALE
description: Mediative piece by Designcollector Network and Digital Decade founder Arseny Vesnin (b.1981). Interdisciplinary mediator guiding artists and communicating the future of art. Reflecting on Ilya and Emilia Kabakov's "Not Everyone Will Be Taken Into the Future" installation from 2001, this mediative piece leaves no choice but to relax and exhale. Among all valuables - tranquility and peace is the most underrated and needed now. Get it back, exhale.
